selectJobCategoryByID: SELECT * FROM jobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? or NameJobCategory = ?
selectUserNotActivated: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.Email, ua.FullName, ua.IsMale, ua.PhoneNumber, ua.PlaceName, ua.StreetName, ua.Image, ua.PersonID,  DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateAccount, ua.PointsAverage, ua.CountPeopleRated, ujc.CategoryID, jc.NameJobCategory, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory FROM useraccounts as ua INNER JOIN userjobcategories  AS ujc on ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID INNER JOIN jobcategories AS jc ON jc.CategoryID = ujc.CategoryID WHERE ujc.ActiveStatus = ? AND ua.UserTypeID = ?
selectCVActivated: select ujc.CategoryID, jc.NameJobCategory, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, jc.ImageStore, DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateAccount, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateCV from userjobcategories as ujc inner join jobcategories as jc on ujc.CategoryID = jc.CategoryID inner join useraccounts as ua on ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID where ujc.UserWorkerID = ? and ujc.ActiveStatus = ?
selectCVByCategoryID: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.FullName, ua.Image, ua.PointsAverage, ua.CountPeopleRated, ua.PersonID, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory FROM useraccounts AS ua INNER JOIN userjobcategories AS ujc ON ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID WHERE ujc.CategoryID = ? AND ujc.ActiveStatus = ?
selectCVByQuery: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.FullName, ua.Image, ua.PhoneNumber, ua.PointsAverage, ua.CountPeopleRated, ua.Latitude, ua.Longitude, ua.StatusOnline, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory, jc.NameJobCategory FROM useraccounts AS ua INNER JOIN userjobcategories AS ujc ON ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID INNER JOIN jobcategories AS jc ON ujc.CategoryID = jc.CategoryID WHERE ua.UserTypeID = ? AND ujc.ActiveStatus = ?
selectCVByQuery2: SELECT ua.UserAccountID, ua.FullName, ua.Image, ua.PointsAverage, ua.PersonID, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') AS CreateDateJobCategory FROM useraccounts AS ua INNER JOIN userjobcategories AS ujc ON ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID WHERE ua.UserTypeID = ? AND ujc.ActiveStatus = ?
selectCVByUserID: select ujc.CategoryID, jc.NameJobCategory, ujc.Exprience, ujc.Qualifications, ujc.GeneralInformation, jc.ImageStore, DATE_FORMAT(ua.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateAccount, DATE_FORMAT(ujc.CreateDate, '%d/%m/%Y') as DateCreateCV, ujc.ActiveStatus from userjobcategories as ujc inner join jobcategories as jc on ujc.CategoryID = jc.CategoryID inner join useraccounts as ua on ua.UserAccountID = ujc.UserWorkerID AND ujc.UserWorkerID = ? AND (ujc.ActiveStatus = 0 OR ujc.ActiveStatus = 1)
insertJobCategoryByCategoryID: INSERT INTO userjobcategories(CategoryID, UserWorkerID, Exprience, Qualifications, GeneralInformation) SELECT ?,?,?,?,? WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM userjobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? and UserWorkerID = ?) LIMIT 1
updateActiveCV: UPDATE userjobcategories SET ActiveStatus = 1, ActiveDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UserAdminActive = ? WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ?
updateNotActivatedCV: UPDATE userjobcategories SET Exprience = ?, Qualifications = ?, GeneralInformation = ? WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ?
deleteCV: DELETE FROM userjobcategories WHERE CategoryID = ? AND UserWorkerID = ? AND ActiveStatus = 0
